CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?
How many outer arcs are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Oats?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Oats is arc {Sugarcane}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Soybeans?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Soybeans is arc {Potatoes}.

VPR.Q: Which arc has the largest output flow in this chord chart?
Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Potatoes to Soybeans in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Sugarcane to Potatoes in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Sugarcane to Corn in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Sugarcane and Corn in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Sugarcane and Corn is {181}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Corn and Soybeans in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Corn and Soybeans is {192}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value in the chord chart?
What is the minimum flow value in the chord chart?

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Sugarcane?
SC.A: The total flow output from Sugarcane is {415}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Oats?
SC.A: The total flow input by Oats is {318}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 285? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {318} from {Corn} to {Oats}, a flow of {299} from {Oats} to {Corn}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 131? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {119} from {Soybeans} to {Potatoes}, a flow of {102} from {Potatoes} to {Soybeans}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 186 and 235? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {225} from {Soybeans} to {Corn}, a flow of {192} from {Corn} to {Soybeans}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Potatoes to Soybeans or from Sugarcane to Corn?
NC.A: The flow from {Sugarcane} to {Corn} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Corn to Oats, from Sugarcane to Corn, or from Potatoes to Soybeans?
NC.A: The flow from {Corn} to {Oats} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Soybeans}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Corn} and {Oats}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Oats, Arc Corn, Arc Soybeans, Arc Sugarcane, Arc Potatoes}.
